alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 6:57PM CDT until July 16 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Cherry County in north central Nebraska... East central Sheridan County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 645 PM MDT. * At 557 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gordon, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Highway 61 crossing the Snake River, Morgan Lake, Indian Hill, Intersection of Highway 61 and Shadbolt Road, Intersection of Highway 20 and Irwin Road, Intersection of Highway 61 and Survey Valley Road, Rock Hill and Bayonne. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 107 and 122. Highway 61 between mile markers 184 and 213. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
